interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: R-NEU 200 Cotton Rounds, 100% Natural Turkish Cotton Makeup Remover and Facial Cleansing Cotton Round Pads, Waffle Textured Hypoallergenic Cotton Wipes, 2.25 Inch Diameter (200 Pack)
Review Date: 2020/04/25
Store: R-NEU
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Size': '2.25 Inch (Pack of 200)', 'Brand': 'R-NEU', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 4.8 x 2.28 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'yhua8a-654', 'UPC': '696292837730', 'Manufacturer': 'R-NEU'}
Review Text: Swisspers is my usual brand but for some strange reason I decided to give these a try. They're "ok" ...they are soft and absorbent but they tend to shed fibers even when wet. As I use these around my eye area that is not a good thing! Will return to my usual rounds.
Review Title: JUST OK
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sigma 3DHD - Precision Brush - Pink
{'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Brass', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 1 x 8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 8 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3DP02'}
This is another great brush from Sigma! I now have 4 Sigma brushes and all four are of outstanding quality. This little brush does exactly  what Sigma's website says it will do (see the video on their site) and I highly recommend it. I no longer see any reason to pay $40 and up for one makeup brush when Sigma offers such a large variety of brushes at half the price!
Another win for Sigma
R-NEU 200 Cotton Rounds, 100% Natural Turkish Cotton Makeup Remover and Facial Cleansing Cotton Round Pads, Waffle Textured Hypoallergenic Cotton Wipes, 2.25 Inch Diameter (200 Pack)
R-NEU
{'Size': '2.25 Inch (Pack of 200)', 'Brand': 'R-NEU', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 4.8 x 2.28 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'yhua8a-654', 'UPC': '696292837730', 'Manufacturer': 'R-NEU'}
Swisspers is my usual brand but for some strange reason I decided to give these a try. They're "ok" ...they are soft and absorbent but they tend to shed fibers even when wet. As I use these around my eye area that is not a good thing! Will return to my usual rounds.
JUST OK
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Strong preference for Sigma products, indicative of trust in quality and value, but open to experimenting with other brands.
- **Value-Conscious:** Looks for affordable options without compromising on quality, contrasting high-priced alternatives.
- **Quality Focused:** Prioritizes high-quality makeup tools, with a positive perception of design and functionality, although recent experiences highlight a slight letdown with alternatives.
- **Frequency of Use:** Regular use of brushes and cleansing tools, reflecting a commitment to makeup application and beauty routines.
- **Cosmetics Enthusiast:** Enthusiasm for cosmetics tools indicates an interest in makeup artistry or beauty applications.
- **Skin Type & Age Range:** Engages with products suitable for all skin types and adult demographics, suggesting versatility in product selection.
- **Product Review Behavior:** Tends to provide positive reviews; however, recent experiences show a willingness to express dissatisfaction when expectations are not met, indicating a discerning nature regarding product performance.

Overall, the user maintains a clear preference for effective, high-quality beauty tools that offer good value while also demonstrating a critical approach to new purchases, emphasizing the importance of functionality and reliability in their beauty routine.
